Australia | Australia<br> (Research focussed) | New Zealand | North America | UK

Associate Lecturer | Research Associate |  |  | Assistant Lecturer

Professor | Professor |  Professor | Distinguished/Endowed Professor | Professor


Information taken from these wikipedia articles: [Academic ranks in Australian and New Zealand](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Academic_ranks_(Australia_and_New_Zealand)) and [Academic ranks in UK](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Academic_ranks_in_the_United_Kingdom).
